column4: Im new to linux and cant get this command line to work:  sudo cp ~/downloads/alsa*.   i get the following msg icp: missing destination file operand after `/home/fatedkiss/downloads/alsa*.'n term:
cp is a copy command, you listed where you want to copy from, but not where you want to copy to
its like this "sudo cp what_I_want_to_copy where_I_want_to_copy_to
